name: Fire Plant
description:
Instructions:

You can walk around with arrow keys or WASD, and jump around with space, up arrow, or W.

Collecting a box plant means that if you die, a box will appear in the place you died.

Collecting a fire plant means that when you die, a fire will spawn at the place you died, destroying all crates around the place you died.

When you collect a plant and die, if you respawn and die you will have to restart.

you can push around the crates that you spawned with a box plant.

Your goal is to get to the green flag. Good luck!

This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam, and the theme was "Failure Is Progress".

I promise it was 637th place in the overall score, and about 242nd for the topic (my highest score). My music score was way down low because I didn't have time to make music. I don't remember, but I think I got around 500 for simplicity, fun and visuals. 

You might ask why I didn't just upload it to the jam, and I did. I just accidentally deleted the game later.

This is my first jam game.
